editor.title: Artifact Editor
editor.curSubEffDesc: Every 4 artifact upgrades, you get a substat roll. Substat Efficiency calculates how high the substat rolled as a percentage.
editor.maxSubEffDesc: The Maximum Substats Efficiency of an artifact calculates the efficiency if the remaining upgrades rolled their maximum values.

error.noOverRoll: Substat cannot be rolled more than {{value}} times.

editor.clearPrompt: There is an artifact in editor. Are you sure you want to clear the editor?

info.title: Artifact Editing/Management Guide
info.section1: <0>Substat rolls</0><1>The <1>number of rolls</1> a substat has is shown to the left of the substat. As the number gets higher, the substat is more colorful:<3></3>.</1><2>Substat Efficiency</2><3>The Efficiency of an subtat is a percentage of the current value over the highest potential 5<1></1> value. From the Image, the maximum roll value of CRIT DMG is 7.8%. In efficiency: <3>5.8/7.8 = 69.2%.</3></3><4>Current substats Efficiency vs. Maximum Substats Efficiency</4><5>When a 5<1></1> have 9(4+5) total rolls, with each of the rolls having the highest value, that is defined as a 100% efficient artifact. However, most of the artifacts are not this lucky. The <3>Current substats Efficiency</3> of an artifact is a percentage over that 100% artifact. The <5>Maximum Substats Efficiency</5> is the maximum possible efficiency an artifact can achieve, if the remaining artifact rolls from upgrades are the hightest possible value.</5><6>Locking an artifact</6><7>By locking an artifact <1></1>, This artifact will not be picked up by the build generator for optimization. An equipped artifact is locked by default.</7>
info.section2: <0>Artifact Editor</0><1>A fully featured artifact editor, that can accept any 3<1></1> to 5<3></3> Artifact. When a substat is inputted, it can calculate the exact roll values, and from it, the efficiency. It will also make sure that you have the correct number of rolls in the artifact according to the level, along with other metrics of validation.</1><2>Scan screenshots</2><3>Manual input is not your cup of tea? You can scan in your artifacts with screenshots! On the Artifact Editor, click the <1>Show Me How!</1> button to learn more.</3><4>Automatic Artifact Scanner</4><5>If you are playing Genshin on PC, you can download a tool that automatically scans all your artifacts for you, and you can then import that data in <1></1> Database. Here is a recommended tool: <3>「天目」-- Amenoma</3>.</5><6>Duplicate/Upgrade artifact detection</6><7>Did you know GO can detect if you are adding a <1>duplicate</1> artifact that exists in the system? It can also detect if the current artifact in editor is an <3>upgrade</3> of an existing artifact as well. Once a duplicate/upgrade is detected, a preview will allow you to compare the two artifacts in question(See Image).</7>
info.section3:
<0>Artifact Inventory

All your artifacts that you've added to GO is displayed here. The filters here allow you to further refine your view of your artifacts.

<2>Example: Finding Fodder Artifacts

By utilizing the artifact filter, and the artifact efficiency calculations, you can quickly find artifacts to feed as food.

<4>In this example, the filters are set thusly: <5><0>Limit level to 0-8.<1>Unlocked artifacts in Inventory.<2>Removing the contribution of flat HP, flat DEF and Energy Recharge to efficiency calculations.<3>Sorted by Ascending Max Efficiency.

This will filter the artifact Inventory by the lowest efficiency artifacts, for desired substats.

efficiencyFilter.title: Substats to use in efficiency calculation

artifact.buttonHint: Note: the red buttons above only applies to <1>filtered artifacts</1>
tipsOfTheDay: The maximum efficiency of a 4 star artifact is around 60%.
The maximum efficiency of an artifact will usually decrease as you upgrade. It's perfectly normal!
Substats with "1"s are the hardest to scan in screenshots.
If all your rolls(6) went into a single substat, it will be purple!
Click on "Details" when you are upgrading your artifacts in game to scan as you upgrade.
You can now upload mutiple artifact screenshots to scan!
artifact.lockArtifactTip: Locking a artifact will prevent the build generator from picking it for builds.

fullBurstDMG.text: <0><0><0>Full Elemental Burst DMG</0></0><1>This calculates the combined damage from Razor's normal attacks during his Elemental Burst. It simply sums the Companion X-Hit DMG with the corresponding X-Hit DMG of the normal attack which triggers it.</1></0>

fullBurstDMG.text: <0><0>Full Elemental Burst DMG</0><1>This calculates the total Elemental Burst DMG, including swirl. This calculation assumes:</1><2><0>20 ticks of <1>Burst DMG</1></0><1>15 ticks of <1>absorption DMG</1></1><2>7 ticks of <1>Swirl</1>, for one enemy, OR,</2><3>14 ticks of <1>Swirl</1>, for multiple enemy, that Swirls eachother.</3></2></0>

home.paragraphIntro:
<0>What is Genshin Optimizer?<1>Genshin Optimizer is a tool for the action-rpg gacha game <1>Genshin Impact. It is intended to help you with dealing with the more complex aspect of the game: Artifacts. Artifacts are heavily RNG-based elements that directly contributes to how effective your characters are in the game. This tool seek to alleviate some of the complexity associated with artifact efficiency, along with which artifact to choose on your character to maximize your stats.

However, this tool can do so much more. It will allow calculations of all conditional stats from artifacts, weapons, teams buffs, and calculate how those stats will affect your character in REAL TIME.
home.paragraphArtifactEditor: <0>Artifact Editor</0><1><0>Full featured Artifact editor.</0><1>Add Artifacts by scanning a screenshot.</1><2>Automatically calculate the exact rolled value of each artifact.</2><3>Calculate substat efficiency, using the roll calculations. Use a single number to determine whether to keep or trash an artifact!</3><4>Equip/unequip/swap artifacts between your characters, try out different builds.</4></1>
home.paragraphCharacterEditor: <0>Character Editor</0><1><0>Full featured Character editor.</0><1>Automatically populate character stats at every milestone level/ascension.</1><2>Fully editable stats for customization.</2><3>Calculate current stats based on weapon/artifacts.</3><4>Fully featured weapon, with milestone level/ascension stats</4><5>Apply conditional passives, e.g. Whiteblind's ATK&DEF stacking bonus, to your character stats.</5><6>Apply conditional passives from Artifacts sets as well!</6><7>Under Construction Talent damage calculations.</7><8>Under Construction Update character stats/talents based on constellation.</8></1>
home.paragraphCharacterDamageCalculations: <0>Character Damage Calculations</0><1><0>All the details for every character's talents.</0><1>All numbers should reflect real in game damage.</1><2>Conditional stats and modifications from every Constellation accounted for.</2><3>Shows calculations for all the numbers, along with formulas. I show my work.</3><4>Enemy editor with level/ resistance fields to customize damage calcualtions.</4><5>Account for elemental infusion for normal/charged/plunging attacks.</5><6>Real time damage calculations.</6></1>
home.paragraphBuildGenerator: <0>Build Generator</0><1><0>Generator builds for specific characters using artifacts added by user.</0><1>Limit the builds by artifact sets, main stats...</1><2>Sort the generated builds by a specific stat for maximization.</2><3>Generator will not pick up artifacts already equipped on a different character.</3><4>Compare generated artifact build against artifact currently on character.</4><5>Use conditional stats from artifact sets, e.g. Gladitator's 4-set normal attack DMG Bonus, as part of the build calculations.</5></1>
home.paragraphTools: <0>Tools and Doodads</0><1><0>Server time, with countdown to reset.</0><1>Resin Counter.</1><2>Experience Calculator, to optimize EXP. books usage.</2><3><0>$t(ui:underConstruction)</0> Resource Converter, for all those pesky x3 tiered resources.</3><4><0>$t(ui:underConstruction)</0> To-Do list: a dynamic to-do list to tell you what to grind for every day</4></1>
home.paragraphFuture: <0>What's for the future?</0><1><0>Full talent/constellation calculations for every released character.</0><1>Saving multiple artifact builds per character, for comparasion.</1><2>Food buffs, team buffs.</2><3>Resource planning to see artifact/character/weapon commitment costs.</3><4>Artifact Analytics, graphs to show your artifact data.</4></1><2>For more, and to check on what is being worked on, join our <1>discord.</1></2>
home.paragraphHelpDevelopment: <0>Want to help the developer?</0><1>Genshin Optimizer has been the manifestation of many days and weeks of sleepless nights, and the developer is still actively trying to improve and add features. If you want to give feedback, request a feature, report a bug, please join our <1>discord.</1></1><2>If you want to fiancially support the developer, please either donate via <1>Paypal</1> or <3>Patreon</3>.</2>
home.paragraphCredits:
<0>Credit where credit is due

GO would not be where it is without all these sources/people. Time to take a bow and thank them.

<2><0>Thanks to everyone in the community, and especially people on our <1>discord for providing feedback and helping me improve this tool.<1>Thanks to <1>Honey Impact, for giving us a reliable, consistent source for data and numbers. All our calculations would be moot without them.<2>A healthy percent of our Genshin images are yoinked from <1>The Genshin Impact Wiki, so a serendipitous thanks for them.<3>Special thanks to members of our community who has gone the extra file, and has been helping us test formulas by recording in-game data, and people who has helped us with source code contributions.<4>Thanks for everyone else, for sharing this tool, and getting more people to use this tool.<5>Lastly, and most importantly, thank <1>YOU, for using GO right now.

goUpload.title: Genshin Optimizer format
goUpload.migrate: Database will be migrated to a newer version. Please consider re-downloading the database after import.
goUpload.deleteDatabasePrompt: Are you sure you want to replace your database? All existing characters and artifacts will be deleted.

monaUpload.title: mona-uranai format
monaUpload.deleteExistingExplanation:
If you're doing a complete import, any artifacts not found in this import will be deleted.(foddered)
Upgraded artifacts will not be deleted, but updated accordingly.
monaUpload.deleteExistingPrompt: Are you sure you want to delete all artifacts not found in the current import? (Upgraded artifacts will not be affected.)
